title: following provisions of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Road Traffic Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: following provisions of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come
heading: 2. The 20th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come 
into operation: 

(a) Part 1, and 

(b) 

sections 16, 17, 18, 19 and 22. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 May, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [198] 3
